revisionDesc.change: Replace internal notes with external notes
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
updated TEI header to reflect new project practices; moved editorial notes to external file and replaced with ptr; other editing changes as necessary
Updated notes from proofreadiong. Replaced Unicode 8210 in Edd note with 8211 (en dash).
Completed proofreading changes, added note on Whitman departure from Brooklyn to Washington to affirm date, expanded Drum Taps annotation.
Correct date format in title, update annotations
Proofread and correct, expand annotation on Drum Taps
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p: i have waited and waited to hear from you and have got no word from you since you left which seems so strange that i feel quite uneasy for fear something is the matter i may get a letter this afternoon but i cant can't conceeve conceive why i have not heard from you you are so promt prompt to write and i wanted so to hear of your safe arrival it is very warm here to day uncomfortably so Edd has been quite sick with his eye and face all swoln swollen up so he could not see

he has taken some medicine and is some better to day Walt where is all the Drum taps we have looked all over for one or two i thought you left some up stairs but cant can't find one i had one of the first ones on the table here and i cant can't find it i used to read some in it almost every night before i went to Bed you must write just as quick as you get this no more but write

postscript.p: did you get the paper the new yorker
